title: Aarya Emerald Vine Stud Earrings - Enchanting Jadau Style
materials: Polki Diamonds (N WT: 7.92). Features exquisite Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: Intricate floral vine design in the classic Jadau style, with a central vibrant Emerald. The Polki diamonds are meticulously set to enhance the emerald's brilliance, creating a captivating contrast of colors. The openwork design adds a touch of lightness and modern elegance. The gold work exhibits fine detail reminiscent of traditional South Indian craftsmanship.
colors: and Sparkling White (Polki Diamonds). A classic and auspicious color combination for South Indian jewelry.

description: These earrings represent a beautiful fusion of traditional Jadau craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The natural Emerald and Polki diamonds offer exceptional brilliance and value. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, while the intricate design adds a touch of timeless elegance. A valuable addition to any jewelry collection, embodying South Indian heritage and refined taste.
